MooseX::Storage::Engine::IO::AtomicFile(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::Storage::Engine::IO::AtomicFile(3pm)

NAME

MooseX::Storage::Engine::IO::AtomicFile - The actually atomic file storage mechanism.

VERSION

version 0.45

DESCRIPTION

This provides the actual means to store data to a file atomically.

METHODS

file
load
store ($data)

Introspection

meta

BUGS

All complex software has bugs lurking in it, and this module is no exception. If you find a bug please either email me, or add the bug to cpan-RT.
